text:
Hi Philip 
I some time ago I was working in a company with LTS everywhere. It was nice. But
it works, until it no longer works: New devices have no drivers for your
obsolete Windows version, users protest "why my webcam in this new laptop is not
working" (no drivers), some applications protest because your Windows is out of
support (it is not, but...), etc. etc. Not everything in your PC is from
Microsoft ;-) 
For a VDI environment, where everything is tight controlled and virtual or OT
environments where everything is validated and change once every 10 years, it is
an option. But to deploy on standard clients, I would avoid it. 
Best regards 
Seve 
Von:  <
